about_the_game:
Nature of the world has withered away due to magic-absorbing crystals.

Play as Hana, a cat-like member of magic-attuned kemime race, in her grand adventure to restore the magic to the world. Explore long-forgotten ruins of ancient civilizations and gain power in order to overthrow technological empire that feeds on the world's misery. Meet friends and enemies as you traverse across 8+ vast lands seeking the destruction of crystals that killed the nature.

Features

  • Explore a big, interconnected world divided into multiple distinctive lands full of forsaken ruins and secrets.

  • Platforming-focused gameplay with smooth controls. Run, jump and slide through various obstacles and your foes.

  • Gain new powers and abilities to open new paths and ways of navigation.

  • Destroy your enemies with your boots or magic spells. Plenty of different weapons and special equipment to customize how you fight.

  • Find and upgrade magical flowers to unlock powerful attacks. Strategize and swap spells depending on the situation.

  • Multiple endings that will require you to go to great lengths and discover long-lost mysteries.

The Realm of Devetlam

A great cataclysm of times forgotten has transformed the realm of Devetlam into scattered floating islands. Each landmass comes with unique environment and dangers. From depths of the ocean, through vast deserts to the peaks of frigid mountains, find your way as you traverse long-abandoned remains of the past. The lands are inhabited by dangerous creatures that evolved in a harsh environment.

On your way you will also come across modern settlements and secret facilities full of deadly robots and mechanical defenses. The technological forces of Metropolis will try to stop you from reviving the world's nature.

Rich Platforming Action

With jumping on enemies being one of your primary means of attack, Voice of Flowers puts great focus on character movement and controls. Discover again many elements from the old classics as they are put together with new twists. The world is full of challenges that will put your skills to the test.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @2Ghz
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU, Vulkan 1.2 Support
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @3Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or similar
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

name: Voice of Flowers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @2Ghz
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU, Vulkan 1.2 Support
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @3Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or similar
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Embark on an epic adventure full of perils and secrets. Explore distinct forsaken lands of Devetlam and fight your way by jumping on your enemies or showering them with a plethora of magic spells. An open-world platforming action inspired by the classics.
